всего работ в моей категории прошло в Sh.en: total works in my category made it to the Shortlist

G8 — это независимый международный фести.en: G8 is an independent international festival that unites more than 20 creative industries on a single platform. New projects, the boldest cross-genre cases, art performances and stories of success and failure.

G8 — независимый международный фестиваль.en: The G8 is a unique international festival that unites all creative industry sectors under one roof, fostering an environment for the growth of the creative economy. It's a potent blend of energy, real-world case studies, and inspiring individuals.

Финишировала этот праздник креатива торж.en: The celebration of creativity ended with the award ceremony for the winners of the G8 Creative Awards competition. Afterwards, there was an afterparty from the Resonance Moscow promo team.

Мы запустимся вновь весной 2025 года. Сп.en: We'll be launching again in spring 2025. Thanks for sharing this madness with us. In the meantime, watch the G8 2024 replay.

Фестиваль соберет более 60 спикеров из 2.en: The festival is slated where over 60 speakers from 20 different industries will share insights on project launches, visionary work, and new product introductions. Following the presentations, the Awards Ceremony and Afterparty will commence.

В&nbsp;2024 году каждый желающий может с.en: In 2024 like last year, everyone is welcome to judge the entries. Sign up online and vote for your favorite entries in all categories.

Номинации и категории конкурса G8 Creati.en: The nominations and categories of the G8 Creative Awards are divided into two blocks: Creative Advertising and Creative Industries. The jury of the competition are recognized experts and market leaders in the creative sector with their own communities. The competition accepts entries from representatives of advertising and creative agencies, architecture firms, design studios, brands, creative communities, media, labels, production and freelance professionals and creative units.

В 2024 году открылись три номинации Youn.en: Three Young nominations for the Creative Advertising block have opened in 2024.

Категории и номинации блока Creative Adv.en: Creative Advertising block categories and nominations are included in the AKAP rankings.

Заявки принимаются с 1 мая по 22 августа.en: Applications will be accepted from May 1 to August 22nd.

Более 30&nbsp;представителей креативных.en: More than 30 representatives of creative industries, new projects, true stories of successes and failures, business networking, art performances and public talks, cross-industry and creative collaborations, clients and much more. G8 is a great opportunity to hear insider information from the best speakers of the creative industries.

Каждый год мы делаем насыщенную программ.en: Each year, we curate a dynamic program that includes lectures, business networking, and art performances. This year's conference, marking our seventh year, promises to be an inspiring event, providing an opportunity to contemplate the diversity of creative industries, their inevitable evolution, and the power of creativity. Join us September 15, 2023 Hlebozavod №9

Each year, we curate a dynamic program that includes lectures, business networking, and art performances. This year's conference, marking our seventh year, promises to be an inspiring event, providing an opportunity to contemplate the diversity of creative industries, their inevitable evolution, and the power of creativity.

13 сентября на территории Хлебозавода №9.en:
On September 13, more than a hundred leaders of creative industries will gather on the territory of Bakery No. 9. G8 unites unique talents, shares valuable experience and demonstrates the powerful force of the creative industry.

Performances in the new season are divided into two formats: luxurious - deep and thoughtful speeches about cases, beauty, systematicity, a unique approach; and crazy - performances under the auspices of the word 'game' - performance, actionism and anything else.

G8 2024 Headliners: Danil Trabun, Vlad Sitnikov, Rodion Skryabin, Roman Kovalishin, Leonid Feigin, Natasha Klimchuk, Yan Topless, Boris Alkhimovich.

G8 Creative Awards — это честный взгляд.en: The G8 Creative Awards provides an honest perspective on work, as viewed by those who have reached their goals and are recognized experts. We invite submissions from advertising and creative agencies, architectural firms, design and web studios, brands, creative associations, media organizations, labels, productions, and independent freelancers. The deadline for applications is August 27th.

Конкурс G8 Awards принимает заявки от пр.en: G8 Awards will accept entries from advertising and creative agencies, design and web studios, brands, creative associations, media, labels and producers, as well as freelancers. The jury panel includes leading industry experts.

В этом сезоне/категории нет победителей..en: There are no winners in this season

Фестиваль креативных индустрий G8 – это.en: The G8 Creative Industries Festival is a unique event where madness goes beyond reality!

G8 прошел 13 сентября и собрал более 300.en: G8 took place on September 13 and brought together more than 3,000 talented guests and hundreds of experts from creative industries, who spoke in four halls of the Bread Factory and online.

Мы запустили мотор творческого двигателя.en: We started the creative engine and turned the site into a bustling networking space for exchanging ideas and creating new projects.

Самое важное о вашем проекте в коротком.en: The most important things about your project in a short 30-second video (video, screencast).

1. Обязательно проверьте настройки прива.en:
1. Be sure to check the privacy settings of the page from which the video was added and the privacy settings of the video. The user or group page from which the video was posted must be open to everyone, including unauthorized users. The video settings must be viewable by everyone, including unauthorized users.

2. Go to the video you need and click the Share (Vimeo) or 'Share' (Vkontakte) button.

3. Copy the text from the Embed (Vimeo) or Embed code (Vkontakte) field and paste it into the link field.
